comment.author: 37184345@N04
comment._content:
one of the false doors of the substructure of the step pyramid of king zose........the titles of the king are written on the wall say.....king of upper and lower egypt...he who belongs to the two goddess ntr - kht.
on both jambs the Hours name of the king is written inside the serkh
which is a rectangular surmounted by the falcon-god Hours
